feed.title: Nephia - mini WAF written in perl
feed.author: Nephia development team

entry.title: Getting started to Nephia
entry.content:
Getting started to Nephia

Install Nephia

$ cpanm Nephia

Create your project

$ nephia-setup YourApp

Up your project

$ cd ./YourApp
$ plackup

Then, you can access to http://nephia.github.io/blog:5000/ .

entry.title: About
